name: HantavirusInfectionAndDiseasesDisordersICD10CM
title: Hantavirus Infection and Diseases (Disorders) (ICD10CM)
description: Unable to find a code representing only Hantavirus infection. We decided to include A98.5 (Hemorrhagic fever with renal manifestations).  It is listed as a possible synonym but is not specific for Hantavirus and a patient with Hantavirus infection may not have renal manifestations.
